tasks.title: Create Life Event Object
tasks.description: Set up Life Event object (Life_Event__c) with necessary fields (Event_Name__c, Event_Date__c, Contact__c) and sharing settings (Private).
acceptance_criteria: Life_Event__c object is created with specified fields.

tasks.title: Create Email Notification Flow
tasks.description: Develop a Flow (Send_Email_Notification) that sends an email notification to the related Contact after a new Life Event record is created.
acceptance_criteria: Email notification is sent to contact upon Life Event creation.

tasks.title: Configure Profile Permissions
tasks.description: Set up Profile permissions (View, Create, Edit, Delete) for Life_Event__c object.
acceptance_criteria: Profile permissions are set correctly for Life Event object.
Test user can perform the specified actions on the Life Event records.

tasks.title: Create Custom Page Layout
tasks.description: Design a custom page layout for Life Event that includes Event Name, Event Date, and related Contact fields.
acceptance_criteria: Custom page layout is created and configured properly.
Layout displays required fields for users consistently.

tasks.title: Testing and Validation
tasks.description: Conduct testing of the entire implementation, including object creation, flow execution, permission checks, and UI elements.
acceptance_criteria: All tasks are verified and pass testing.
End-user can create a Life Event and receive notifications successfully.

key_risks: Incompatibility of Flow with existing email settings, potential delays in receiving notifications.
Permission misconfiguration may restrict user access to Life Event records.
Testing phase may reveal unanticipated performance issues in production.
success_criteria: Life Event objects can be created successfully with proper field values.
Email notifications are sent to the correct contacts upon Life Event creation.
Users can access and perform actions on Life Event records per the defined permissions.
